sentences.sContent: I blame myself for what has happened.
sentences.sCn: 发生这一切都怪我自己。

sentences.sContent: ...and I can see myself sitting on a small chair by the fire doing needle work...
...I myself have three children Who are all fans of the touch screen...
...day goes by that I don't ask myself why there are so few women economists on the free market side...
...It is a dilemma that continues to be a root cause of anxiety both for myself and for thousands of other UK employees...
...The 10-hour days crashed around my head; no amount of make-up could disguise my ill health as I battled against the odds to prove to myself that I could still make it in the business world...
...I did all the cooking myself and my wife waited on tables...
...Heidrich now visits websites that discuss gaming addiction regularly to remind myself to keep my love for online games in check...
...the company advertises posts on its website that retired employees like myself can access...
...But I find myself saying “no” a lot when her kids are over at mine...

trans.tranOther: used by the person speaking or writing to show that they are affected by their own action
